Gordon. 
            I thought it had a more European look to it ?, not that I mean it is a muromachi thing or anything, it looks like it is early 1900's or late 1800's, just thought it looked kinda fun. Would a nagako be made like that or do you think it was altered for the fittings ?. 

Maybe it's just a novelty piece.

cheers mate

Rich
